scripts.build-all: npm run build-all-library && npm run build-all-hud
scripts.build-all-hud: cd game/hud && yarn && yarn link @csegames/camelot-unchained && yarn start build
scripts.build-all-library: cd library && yarn && yarn start build && yarn link
scripts.lint: cd game/hud && npm start lint && cd ../../library && npm start lint && cd ../patcher && npm start lint
